info.title: AP Content API
info.description: AP Content API allows you to search and download AP Images content using your own editorial tools, without having to visit the AP Images website.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned content item data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The GUID of a content item (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename for the downloaded content item rendition, in the format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The GUID of a content item (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: The content media type. The default for AP Images  (including all GraphicsBank content) is photo.

parameters.name: rendition
parameters.description: The content item rendition.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: The date when the content item was released, in the format  YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ where the value must be in Coordinated Universal Time  (UTC). B

parameters.name: contentSet
parameters.description: The AP Images content set to be searched.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of search results per page. The default is 25 results with a  maximum of 100 per page

parameters.name: creationDate
parameters.description: The date when the content item was created, in the format  YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ where the value must be in Coordinated Universal Time  (UTC).

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: One or more words from the title of a specific event.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: One or more image ID numbers assigned to content items.

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: A geographic location in the AP Geography vocabulary.

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: The content media type (photo, graphic, video)

parameters.name: metadataLevel
parameters.description: The level of metadata to be included in search results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number within the set of search results. The default is 1.

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: The name of a person who is featured in the content item.

parameters.name: photographer
parameters.description: The photographers first and/or last name.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: showParametrics
parameters.description: By default, query facets that allow you to refine the original  search are returned for each content item at the entry level only.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Specifies how to sort the search results.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: One or more content creators.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject category in the AP Subject vocabulary.

parameters.name: transref
parameters.description: Transmission reference number.
